unnormalised: Interesting transfer window! R. Sharma's move from Chennai FC to Mumbai City FC could be a game-changer. Reminds me of that scene in "Chak De! India" where team dynamics shifted drastically. Hope he adapts well to the Mumbai heat and the team's strategy. It'll be crucial for them to succeed in the upcoming I-League season. A transfer fee of Rs. 50 Lakhs feels justified, considering his track record. Let's see if his performance justifies it at the Cooperage Ground. Wishing him luck!

India" where team dynamics shifted drastically. Hope he adapts well to the Mumbai heat and the team's strategy. It'll be crucial for them to succeed in the upcoming I-League season.
